item.title: ComfyUi motion capture workflow - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for a ComfyUi genius to make a workflow to make motion captures for short films

-Generate character sheets for consistent characters.

-Extract the movement from videos of actors with IP adaptors

-apply the character to the movement.

-generate consistent backgrounds.

-video of characters cut out with transparent background so I can composite the scenes in After Effects. Or alpha masks would also work.

I’m planning on using Getsalt.ai since it is web based and has a lot of nodes built in, but not every node.. so the workflows will have to work with that platform.

The plan is to make animated action films that look like highly produced films, with minimal effort.

What workflows do you think would work best?

How would you create atmospheric effects like smoke, fire and explosions?


Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Stable Diffusion
Skills: Stable Diffusion
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
Hi

I am starting a new YouTube channel, and looking for video editors for it.

The content will be mainly me talking to the camera, in English, and documenting the process of starting a start-up.

I will be sending you raw footage, and your task would be to:

- cut the unnecessary parts (pauses like ums, ahms etc.)
- stitch everything together
- apply filters
- add subtitles (English)
- increase the audio quality.
- add visual effects at the right places to make the video more exciting and capturing.
- make it ready to upload to YouTube

For people who know how to do this, it wouldn't take more than an hour of work.

You need to be able to understand the context of the video, and apply the correct visual effects at the correct place .

I am offering $10 per video for this. I will try to create as many videos as possible during a week.

If you are interested in this, please share your already edited videos in your proposal so that I can see your editing style.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, Digital Video, Video Stream, Social Video Enhancement, Video Cleanup, Visual Effects, Video Editing, YouTube, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: YouTube Video, Digital Video, Video Stream, Social Video Enhancement, Video Cleanup, Visual Effects, Video Editing, YouTube, Explainer Video, Education
Country: Finland
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Manager - Upwork
item.description:
YouTube Channel Manager
Comfortable working via Zoom
Position: YouTube Channel Manager
Monthly Salary: We will pay $100 per month to start with, and this will increase gradually

Monthly Target: Your monthly target will be 100K views Minium monthly.

If you are happy with the above, please do not waste your time applying.

About Us:
We are a dynamic and innovative company, committed to creating engaging and high-quality content that resonates with our audience. We are on a mission to grow our YouTube presence and achieve millions of views, and we need a talented YouTube Channel Manager to help us reach this goal.

Job Description:
We are seeking a passionate and experienced YouTube Channel Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be proficient with vidIQ, have a proven track record of driving substantial viewership growth, and be comfortable working remotely via Zoom. You will be responsible for managing our YouTube channel, creating and implementing strategies to increase views, engagement, and subscribers.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage and optimize our YouTube channel to drive growth and engagement.
Develop and implement strategies to increase video views and subscriber count.
Utilize vidIQ to analyze channel performance, optimize video SEO, and identify growth opportunities.
Create compelling video titles, descriptions, and tags to maximize visibility and reach.
Monitor and respond to audience comments and feedback.
Collaborate with the content creation team to ensure high-quality video production.
Conduct regular performance reviews and provide actionable insights.
Stay up-to-date with YouTube trends, algorithms, and best practices.
Requirements:
Proven experience managing a successful YouTube channel.
Proficiency with vidIQ and a strong understanding of YouTube analytics.
Excellent communication skills and comfort working via Zoom.
Strong knowledge of YouTube SEO and algorithm.
Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for content and growth.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with video editing and production.
Familiarity with other social media platforms and content marketing strategies.
What We Offer:
Competitive salary based on experience.
Flexible working hours and remote work environment.
Opportunity to be part of a growing and dynamic team.
Professional development and growth opportunities.
If you are a motivated and creative individual with a passion for YouTube and a knack for driving viewership, we would love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team and help us achieve YouTube success!

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, a cover letter, and examples of YouTube channels you have managed In your cover letter, please include your experience with vidIQ and any notable achievements in growing YouTube channels.

We will pay $100 per month to start with, and this will increase gradually
Your monthly target will be 100K views Minium monthly.
If you are happy with the above, please do not waste your time applying.



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:52 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Influencer Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management
Skills: Influencer Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Marketing, YouTube, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Management
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hey I am looking for someone to edit the first 28 videos of my upcoming unreal engine tutorial courses.

You will be editing unreal engine tutorial videos.

For the editing you need to do the following
1. Remove any loud background noises and make the audio clear
2. Cut any parts where I cough or make any louds noises
3. Cut out long silent pauses, sometimes I am thinking and there is a pause
4. Cut out if I make an mistakes and i redo a part.
5. You will need to add my into video which I will provide to you at the start and end of every video



Budget: $80
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Explainer Video

item.title: I need a highly experienced video editor for an ongoing project - Upwork
item.description:
I need an experienced video editor with a strong background in editing videos for posting on YouTube.  

I will send you 8 to 12 videos of raw footage per month. You will need to add effects to engage the audience on YouTube.

I would be looking for videos of high quality, at the level of the example here or better.

https://youtu.be/5IR0qp1MXZo?si=gc2cD4YR6KE6imzf

To be considered for this position, please provide the following:

Please send me samples of your work that show the level of work in the example I gave you or better.

HINT: Instead of showing me your entire portfolio, I will tell you that your chances of being hired will significantly increase if you can provide me with just some of your videos that show the same type of video as the one I provided above and that you feel is of the same quality or better. My attention span is not that great. So, sending me to a page showing dozens of different videos you have done that do not relate to what I am looking for, all I am going to do is pick out one or two, and if I don’t see a good comparison I am going to move on to the next candidate.

Put the word “Peanut Butter” in the subject line.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Narrative Video, Video Commercial, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Narrative Video, Video Commercial, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed for video to add on Tiktok - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I need someone to do video editing for video I will be adding on my Tiktok.

This video will be publishing on my YouTube channel on Friday 28th June 3pm so I need it to be on Tiktok on Wednesday. So I need the work done before then.

This is my YouTube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBeu3UYBkf7A8eKfA5_2lvw.

This my Tiktok account - https://www.tiktok.com/@magicnoodles3.

So I need the video started from 0.27 seconds when I say "What's up everyone". When I say will be "life will easy" it needs transiting and showing bits of rest of the video. The sound should be continuing from until I say the "performance starts right now". The last bit of the video should be at 7 minutes 5 seconds.

Regards,

Ronny


Budget: $15
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Intersolar 2024 Video - Upwork
item.description:
My company 2DegreesKelvin (2DK) are a UK based solar engineering specialist. This year (last week), the Founder & CEO of 2DK, John Davies (me) visited the world largest solar exhibition 'Intersolar' in Munich Germany. During my 3 days there, I gathered several selfie style and broader technology focused videos, brand logo images and selfies with friends, colleagues and potential clients.

I am looking for an experienced and efficient video editor to created a 2-3 minute video, which is branded with 2DK, is modern and slick in its style and brings people through my trip to share on social media (LinkedIn). Apart from the 'me talking' bits, I would like some cool, modern, music and an array of transitions which add to the overall feel of the video.

Likely that the videographer needs to build the initial draft to ensure that the style, sequence and feel correct first. Then I'm looking for some labelling and 2DK logos in and out.

The video needs a simple intro and outro featuring the 2DK logo and Intersolar logo. All provided.

Due to some editing on the phone, some of the videos may be out of sequence in the order they are saved and shared. For guidance, I wore a black t-shirt day 1, a white t-shirt day 2, and a grey t-shirt day three. I'd like to keep it in that order if possible.

Also note that the first videos of me landing in the plane are me arriving in Munich. And the final ones of me taking off, and coming out of the clouds are to be at the end of the video.

Zipped folder containing all resources is 1.6GB, so would need to transfer via sharepoint or alternative dataroom.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 13:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
